casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alfred William RILEY, Jr. No. 618P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day, of December 2007 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal (Constitutional Question):

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
